channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Governance

item.title: CVE-2022-22453|2024-09-16T17:57:49.743Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20governance
item.description: IBM Security Verify Identity Manager 10.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 224919.
